long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Day2Day.password is the second app of a suite that aims at making your everyday life better by providing you with tools you need every day.

This application will simply help you be safer online by enabling you to generate strong, complex and long passwords. This app finally makes Google Smart Lock complete and will make you rest easy, knowing that you finally stopped using the same password on every one of your apps.

Better still, we do not collect any information about your online navigation or any personal information for that matter. This contributes to making your daily life simpler.
